Html:
Hi there everyone, i'm trying to get a marker id, how con i get it ? Not the overlay id but the marker id.

Thanks.

if you don't assign any id by yourself, there is no id, you can use Tag property or add something else

i like to use dictionary <int, GMapMarker> ..., therefore i can find marker fast by id
Thanks for your help I did something like that and worked fine :).

Hi Radioman!,

Do you Mean using a custom dictionary in our application or there is some built in mechanism inside the control?  I saw the markers are stored in a collection and therefore couldn't be accessed by id, in fact In all samples you update markers by iterating through the whole collection. Is there a way to update an individual marker by using its id without iterating through the collection?. 

 

tks

HN
I get It, but Do you Mean using a custom dictionary in our application or there is some built in mechanism inside the GMaps.Net Control?

I assume it's a custom one.  And If I change attributes or location of the marker I just invalidate the map to refresh? 

Tks

Regards

HN
